  • Constructor Details

    • Manager

      public Manager(String name, String surname, String userName, String password, MyFoodora myFoodora)
      creates a manager who will manage the MyFoodora platform
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the user
      surname - : the surname of the user
      userName - : the user name in the MyFoodora platform
      password - : the password of the user to login in the MyFoodora platform
      myFoodora - : the myFoodora core

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser(UserType userType, String name, String surname, String userName, String password)
      adds the user
      Parameters:
      userType - : the type of user who is registered : "customer", "courier", "restaurant" or "manager"
      name - : the name of the user
      surname - : the surname of the user
      userName - : the username of the user
      password - : the password of the user

    • activateUser

      public void activateUser(int uniqueID) throws UserNotFoundException
      activate the user of uniqueID of the system
      Parameters:
      uniqueID - : the ID of the user we want to activate
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - : if the user of given uniqueID is not in the system

    • deactivateUser

    • meetTargetProfit

      public double meetTargetProfit(String profitInfo, double targetProfit) throws NonReachableTargetProfitException
      compute the value of the profit related information (service fee, markup percentage or delivery cost) to meet a target profit
      Parameters:
      profitInfo - : the profit related information : "serviceFee", "markup" or "deliveryCost"
      targetProfit - : the target profit to meet
      Returns:
      profitInfoValue : the value of the profit related information
      Throws:
      NonReachableTargetProfitException - : if the target profit cannot be reached
